in.fissionlabs.kpinsights.service

Interface GroupService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GroupServiceImpl

    public interface GroupService

    Service class to perform below user services :

    • Create Group
    • Update Group
    • Delete Group
    • Display Group
    • Display all Groups
    Author:
    bismoy

    • Method Detail

      • createGroup

        Status createGroup(java.lang.String groupName)

        Create Group

        Displays group creation status by calling createGroup method from GroupServiceImpl class

        Parameters:
        groupName - name of group users belong to

      • updateGroup

        Status updateGroup(java.lang.Long id,
                 java.lang.String groupName)

        Update Group

        Updates group by calling updateGroup method from GroupServiceImpl class

        Parameters:
        id - group id
        groupName - name of group users belong to

      • deleteGroup

        Status deleteGroup(java.lang.Long Id)

        Delete Group

        Deletes group using it group id by calling updateGroup method from GroupServiceImpl class

        Parameters:
        Id - group id #

      • displayGroup

        Group displayGroup(java.lang.Long id)

        Display Group

        Displays group name using group id by calling displayGroup method from GroupServiceImpl class

        Parameters:
        id - group id #

      • displayAllGroups

        DisplayAllResults displayAllGroups()

        Display all groups

        Displays all existing groups from the database by calling displayAllGroups method from GroupServiceImpl class
